' Code Generated by Sidekick is for learning and experimentation purposes only.
Private Function IsLtdStopWord(ByVal w As String) As Boolean
    Dim lw As String
    lw = LCase$(w)
    If InStr(lw, "ltd") > 0 Then
        IsLtdStopWord = True
    ElseIf InStr(lw, "co.ltd") > 0 Then
        IsLtdStopWord = True
    Else
        IsLtdStopWord = False
    End If
End Function
